page.description: Returns the number of records selected by the query in the current layout.
page.syntax: Record_Count as N = <OBJECT>.Queryrun([c filter_expression [,c order_expression [,c query_name [,c additive [,c level_name [,l displaywarning [,c query_options ]]]]]]])

argument.name: Record_Count
argument.description: The number of records found by the query.

argument.name: filter_expression
argument.description: An expression that selects records from the table.

argument.name: order_expression
argument.description: Optional. Default = Record order. An expression that orders the records selected.

argument.name: query_name
argument.description: Optional. The name of the query. Use "Temporary Query" to define a query that Alpha Anywhere can discard to make room for new queries.

argument.name: additive
argument.description: Optional. Default = "No". "Yes" = The query is in addition to the form's current query. "No" = The query replaces the form's currency query.

argument.name: level_name
argument.description: Optional. Default = "crosslevel". The name of the parent table when the Filter_Expression is based on the child table or the parent and child tables where there is a one-to-many relationship between the parent and child tables.

argument.name: displaywarning
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If no records are found, whether to display a warning.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUERYRUN() method applies a query to the current layout. The method returns the number of records selected by the query.

section.title: Example
section.description: The current script opens a form and only displays records from Massachusetts:
section.example: dim P as P P = form.load("customer information") Result = p.QueryRun("bill_state_region = 'ma'") if (result = 0) then ui_msg_box("Error","No records found") p.close() else p.activate() end if.
